lead_paragraph: The Islamic State claimed responsibility for the attack, which killed at least 52 people and wounded at least 100, though some Pakistani officials were skeptical that the group had been involved.

byline.contributor: Zia ur-Rehman contributed reporting from Karachi, Pakistan.

headline.print_headline: Bombing at Sufi Shrine in Pakistan Kills Dozens
headline.main: Bombing at Sufi Shrine in Pakistan Kills Dozens
